experiences.description:
TTC Solutions is a trusted IT consulting, services & solutions company empowering small, medium & large enterprises over the world to accelerate business performance. Established in 2016, TTC Solutions is headquartered in Hanoi, Vietnam with more than 200+ software professionals. Our strong commitment to quality has made us serve many large customers at both local & oversea market.

Since the year of 2016, we deliver high-end software solutions meeting our clients` needs across multiple business domains based on deep expertise in a comprehensive technology stack including Java, Ruby On Rails, Microsoft, Mobile, PHP, Cloud, Testing, and CMS platform. We also assist the client in their digital transformation process by leveraging the best in emerging technologies such as Blockchain, AI Machine Learning, Big Data, Cloud and VR/AR.
